attributes.action: Extend the amount of time theory test certification is valid for due to COVID
attributes.additional_details: Extend the time certification is valid to atleast another 6 months to give time for people learning to drive to catch back up or to get their test rebooked from cancellations
attributes.background: To extend the theory test certification because of the hold back from COVID where people haven’t been able to take tests in the time frame of their theory test.
